item.name: Beckett's Flat
item.description: Belizar (Bill) and Noni Ilic opened Becketts Flat in 1997. Situated just off the Bussell Highway, midway between Busselton and the Margaret River, it draws upon estate vineyards, first planted in 1992 (cabernet sauvignon, shiraz, sauvignon blanc, chardonnay, verdelho, semillon and merlot). The wines, which are made onsite, include a range of kosher wines under the Five Stones label Exports to Canada.
